experience.title: UI Designer
experience.description: In my role at Manipal, my responsibilities include :o	Consumer App: Designed Android Consumer application including splash screen, Login screen's, forgot password screens, Internal logical data flow screens, scheme selection pages, transaction history screens, Balance sheet screen, slot selection screen and final submit screen. Consisting of journey trackers on every screen.o	Agent App: Designed Android Agent App including splash screen, Login screen's, forgot password screens, scheme selection pages, transaction history screens, Balance sheet screen, and final submit screen. Consisting of journey trackers on every screen.o	SBO APP: Designed Android SBO application including three processes fresh lead, balance transfer and doorstep.o	Mobile Screen Design: Design intuitive and responsive mobile screens in Figma.o	Website & Dashboard: Build and design interactive website dashboards with Power Bl integration. Designed Web portal for central Opp‚Äôs including all navigations internal logical flows lead flows, correction tabs with different expend close notification screens.o	Data Flow Charts: Illustrate data flow processes clearly and effectively using Figma.o	Animation: Design engaging animations to enhance user experience & I have created an animation flow for the gold loan process using Figma.o	Social Media Posts: Craft professional and eye-catching social media post designs for LinkedIn & Facebooko	Presentation Creation: Develop polished and effective PowerPoint presentations for various purposes
experience.description_html:
In my role at Manipal, my responsibilities include :
o Consumer App: Designed Android Consumer application including splash screen, Login screen's, forgot password screens, Internal logical data flow screens, scheme selection pages, transaction history screens, Balance sheet screen, slot selection screen and final submit screen. Consisting of journey trackers on every screen.
o Agent App: Designed Android Agent App including splash screen, Login screen's, forgot password screens, scheme selection pages, transaction history screens, Balance sheet screen, and final submit screen. Consisting of journey trackers on every screen.
o SBO APP: Designed Android SBO application including three processes fresh lead, balance transfer and doorstep.
o Mobile Screen Design: Design intuitive and responsive mobile screens in Figma.
o Website & Dashboard: Build and design interactive website dashboards with Power Bl integration. Designed Web portal for central Opp’s including all navigations internal logical flows lead flows, correction tabs with different expend close notification screens.
o Data Flow Charts: Illustrate data flow processes clearly and effectively using Figma.
o Animation: Design engaging animations to enhance user experience & I have created an animation flow for the gold loan process using Figma.
o Social Media Posts: Craft professional and eye-catching social media post designs for LinkedIn & Facebook
o Presentation Creation: Develop polished and effective PowerPoint presentations for various purposes

experience.title: Product Manager - Digital Lending
experience.description: As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.Key Contributions:Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.
experience.description_html:
As an Assistant Product Manager at the Manipal Group & Sahibandhu Fintech Services I have driven significant process improvements and innovation in the Gold Loan industry by designing an automated onboarding journey, reducing operational complexities, and enhancing risk mitigation measures.

Key Contributions:

Vendor Assessment & API Integration: Evaluated vendors and executed API integrations for OCR and document validation, eliminating manual verification and enabling seamless data capture and autofill within the sales application.

Cross-functional Collaboration: Acted as a primary liaison between Sales, Operations, and Tech teams, facilitating alignment and comprehensive product documentation, including concept notes, business cases, and API criteria.

Process Improvement & SOP Development: Spearheaded the formation of SOPs and process improvement initiatives within the product team, leveraging frameworks such as JTBD and Opportunity Analysis to enhance efficiency and drive value.

Throughout my tenure, I have developed a strong foundation in product management, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making. I am skilled in balancing operational efficiencies with customer satisfaction, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. My experiences have equipped me with the strategic insights and technical expertise required to drive product growth and customer success.

Keep it up! You have a long way to go!‚Äù
